channel.title: Comments on: Season Six Gameplay Trailer | Call of Duty®: Black Ops Cold War & Warzone™
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: xDefimate
item.dc:creator: xDefimate
item.description:
Noice. Let’s see now if this game truly will be the “most supported post launch title” in cod since this is the final season.
Doubt it
item.content:encoded:
Noice. Let’s see now if this game truly will be the “most supported post launch title” in cod since this is the final season.

Doubt it

item.title: By: IamEclipse
item.dc:creator: IamEclipse
item.description:
FINALLY anytown USA as a 6v6 map.
Deprogram looks nuts. Never thought we'd see that amazing mission as a multiplayer map. Feels like Micro on the scale of nuts.
Forsaken just keeps looking better and better. I hope it delivers.
Whilst I'm dissapointed we're only getting 2 6v6 maps, im honestly looking forward to this season, it looks like a good way to cap off Cold War.
item.content:encoded:
FINALLY anytown USA as a 6v6 map.

Deprogram looks nuts. Never thought we’d see that amazing mission as a multiplayer map. Feels like Micro on the scale of nuts.

Forsaken just keeps looking better and better. I hope it delivers.

Whilst I’m dissapointed we’re only getting 2 6v6 maps, im honestly looking forward to this season, it looks like a good way to cap off Cold War.

item.title: By: sijaz321
item.dc:creator: sijaz321
item.description: Wait deprogram has the red doors? That's pretty cool for an mp map.
item.content:encoded: Wait deprogram has the red doors? That’s pretty cool for an mp map.

item.title: By: Xyphilis
item.dc:creator: Xyphilis
item.description: Anytown USA, Mason, the galil, a massive new zombies map? Looks like they're trying to send Cold War out with a bang. I'm siked.
item.content:encoded: Anytown USA, Mason, the galil, a massive new zombies map? Looks like they’re trying to send Cold War out with a bang. I’m siked.

item.title: By: Bearskopff
item.dc:creator: Bearskopff
item.description:
All things considered this looks like a pretty good send off for CW. There's been some fairly poor battle passes through the journey of this game but with a good mix of new maps, Forsaken looking superb and a fair few other bits I'm very tempted to dive in.
Would still love to see Nakatomi Plaza turned into a solid 6v6 map but I doubt that dream will ever come true. Just have to hope it survives in the next Warzone update...
item.content:encoded:
All things considered this looks like a pretty good send off for CW. There’s been some fairly poor battle passes through the journey of this game but with a good mix of new maps, Forsaken looking superb and a fair few other bits I’m very tempted to dive in.

Would still love to see Nakatomi Plaza turned into a solid 6v6 map but I doubt that dream will ever come true. Just have to hope it survives in the next Warzone update…

item.title: By: Captain_Jmon
item.dc:creator: Captain_Jmon
item.description: This is all looking dope. A bit disappointed though that we never saw Firing Range, Summit, and good ol Jungle coming back from BO1
item.content:encoded: This is all looking dope. A bit disappointed though that we never saw Firing Range, Summit, and good ol Jungle coming back from BO1

item.title: By: Loyal_Darkmoon
item.dc:creator: Loyal_Darkmoon
item.description: I just wish they would abandon the annual releases and support 1 Game for several years before making a new one...
item.content:encoded: I just wish they would abandon the annual releases and support 1 Game for several years before making a new one…

item.title: By: Deathsquad247
item.dc:creator: Deathsquad247
item.description: The new 6v6 maps look pretty good, season 6 will be a blast by the looks of it.
item.content:encoded: The new 6v6 maps look pretty good, season 6 will be a blast by the looks of it.

item.title: By: deception42
item.dc:creator: deception42
item.description:
Reprogram has the same vibes as Infected from BO3, nice.
Think this'll be a very good season across BOCW and WZ
item.content:encoded:
Reprogram has the same vibes as Infected from BO3, nice.

Think this’ll be a very good season across BOCW and WZ

item.title: By: strangedoc22
item.dc:creator: strangedoc22
item.description: The new multiplayer maps look pretty sick
item.content:encoded: The new multiplayer maps look pretty sick
